messages.content: SMAX is an AI-powered conversational assistant that helps users find answers to their questions quickly and easily. SMAX is designed to understand natural language and generate personalized responses based on a user's input. It can be used for a variety of tasks, such as researching products, booking flights, or finding entertainment.
In the context of software products.

In the context of software products, customer feedback is an important source of information for product teams. Customer feedback can help product teams understand how customers are using the product and what features or improvements they would like to see. By analyzing customer feedback, product teams can identify areas for improvement and develop solutions that better meet customer needs.
